title: How to Delete Comments or Posts on the Facebook App

steps.title: Navigate to the comment you want to delete.
steps.content: Navigate to the comment you want to delete. This can be found on your profile . To navigate there, tap your profile picture at the top of your feed. If you aren't already logged in , enter your email address and password to do so now.

steps.title: Tap and hold the comment.
steps.content: Tap and hold the comment. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . This is in red font.

steps.title: Tap Delete again.
steps.content: Tap Delete again. This will confirm the action. If you just want to hide the comment, select Hide from the pop-up menu instead. If needed, you can block or report a user .

steps.title: Navigate to the comment you want to delete.
steps.content: Navigate to the comment you want to delete. This can be found on your Facebook Page . This is different from your profile. To open a page, tap your profile in the top-right. Tap See all profiles , and select the Page. You must have the Admin or Editor role to delete comments from the Page. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap and hold the comment.
steps.content: Tap and hold the comment. A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: Tap Delete.
steps.content: Tap Delete . This is in red font.

steps.title: Tap Delete again.
steps.content: Tap Delete again. This will confirm the action. If you want to hide the comment, select Hide from the pop-up menu instead. Keep in mind that hidden comments will still be visible to the person who posted it and their friends.

steps.title: Navigate to the post you want to delete.
steps.content: Navigate to the post you want to delete. This can be found on your profile or Facebook Page. If you want to delete a post on a Page, make sure you have the proper permissions.

steps.title: Tap ••• .
steps.content: Tap ••• . This is on the right side of the post.

steps.title: Tap Move to trash.
steps.content: Tap Move to trash . This is towards the bottom of the pop-up menu.

steps.title: Tap Move.
steps.content: Tap Move . The post will be deleted. The post will be moved to the trash. You'll have 30 days to recover the post if needed.
